sentences.en: According to local folklore it is an evil place.
sentences.cn: 据当地民间传说，那是个不祥的地方。

sentences.en: According to popular folklore, anyone who owns such a picture will have bad luck.
sentences.cn: 民间盛传拥有这样图画的人会遭厄运.

sentences.en: Here time has changed but not diminished the role of folklore.
sentences.cn: 虽然岁月流逝,时代变迁,这一民风却始终保存下来.

sentences.en: In Chinese folklore the bat is a symbol of good fortune.
sentences.cn: 在中国民间传说中，蝙蝠是好运的象征。

sentences.en: In Chinese folklore the bat is an emblem of good fortune.
sentences.cn: 在中国的民间传说中蝙蝠是好运的象征。

sentences.en: Local folklore has it that prehistoric men drove cattle over these cliffs.
sentences.cn: 当地民间传说中称,史前人类把野牛从这些悬崖上驱赶下去.

sentences.en: Most moving folklore is orally handed down in the countryside.
sentences.cn: 草野田间,流传着许多动人的故事.

sentences.en: OIL prices have a special place in economic folklore.
sentences.cn: 石油价格在经济中占有特殊地位.

sentences.en: She was a grad student, anthropology and folklore.
sentences.cn: 镰旗┒鐢?涓讳慨浜虹被瀛﹀拰姘戦棿浼犺?

sentences.en: Since superstitions are " traditional expressions, " they are folklore.
sentences.cn: 既然迷信是 “ 传统的表述 ”,它就属于民俗.

sentences.en: The image of the fox as a pest is grossly exaggerated in anecdote and folklore.
sentences.cn: 狐狸的害人精形象在传闻和民间故事中遭到严重的夸大。

sentences.en: The story rapidly became part of family folklore.
sentences.cn: 这个故事很快就成为家族传说的一部分。

sentences.en: The victory became part of sporting folklore.
sentences.cn: 那次胜利已成为人们津津乐道的体育传奇故事.

sentences.en: This village has its own traditional dress, cuisine, folklore and handicrafts.
sentences.cn: 这个村子有自己传统的服饰 、 烹调 、 民俗和手工艺.

sentences.en: Traditional form or structure allows us to recognize corresponding bits of folklore in different guises.
sentences.cn: 了解民俗的传统形式或结构,可以使我门抛开事物的不同外表,从中去辨认出有关民俗的点点滴滴.

sentences.en: Zhuge Liang is a synonym for wisdom in folklore.
sentences.cn: 诸葛亮在民间传说中成了智慧的代名词.

words.tran_cn: 有民间风味的；和气的；无拘束的

trans.tran_cn: 民间传说，民俗学，民间创作
trans.tran_en: the traditional stories, customs etc of a particular area or country
